data.pricing_trends: Prices for ski passes generally range from $20 to $50 per day, while accommodation can vary between $50 to $150 per night depending on the level of comfort and proximity to ski resorts.
data.booking_windows: The recommended booking window for winter trips to Altai is 1-3 months ahead during peak season, especially weekends and holidays.
data.demand: The demand for winter tourism in Altai has seen a growth of approximately 15% over the past few years, particularly among families and adventure-seekers looking for an alternative to more commercial ski destinations.
data.competition: Leading competitors include ski resorts in the Caucasus and European destinations, but Altai offers unique natural landscapes and cultural experiences that enhance its attractiveness to visitors.
